text: At Play in the Fields of the Lord is an epic drama movie of 1991. The movie was based on a 1965 novel. The movie is about a couple of Americans who get stuck in the Brazilian Amazon River. Daryl Hannah plays Andy Huben. Kathy Bates plays Hazel. The movie got positive reviews from movie critics. ==Other websites== * * * * Category:1991 drama movies Category:1990s epic movies Category:American drama movies Category:Brazilian movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by HÃ©ctor Babenco Category:Universal Pictures movies Category:Movies about Christianity Category:Movies set in Venezuela
title: At Play in the Fields of the Lord
